law.catch_line: Except for trust money that a lawyer is required to deposit in an attorney trust account that earns ...
law.text:
Except for trust money that a lawyer is required to deposit in an attorney trust account that earns interest payable to the Maryland Legal Services Corporation, a lawyer may withdraw trust money from an attorney trust account and invest it:
as the client or beneficial owner of the trust money instructs; or
as the lawyer and the client or beneficial owner of the trust money agree.
